lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin S. We are stunned and saddened by the untimely passing of our friend of over 50 years. Your wit, charm and sense of humor will be sorely missed. The shock of your passing is unbearable. Something we will never get over. We loved you so. Sincere condolences to his wife Louise. The world has lost a gem. Jane and Larry David 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEGUN, MARTIN S
